comment: You have to do a discussion and quizzes every week that are not clear.  Test questions are confusing.  She gives you an incredible amountn of assignments each week.  The online class is double the work of the classroom class.  Music appreciation is much easier.

Online class has tons of busy work each week.  Too much work for a 1000 level class.   Too many discussion posts, articles to read, and mini projects.  I worked as hard on this class as my 4 hour science class.
